alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Doddridge; Jackson; Pleasants; Ritchie; Roane; Tyler; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:58AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of east central Washington, Pleasants, northwestern Calhoun, Ritchie, northwestern Doddridge, central Tyler, Wirt, northwestern Roane, northeastern Jackson and southeastern Wood Counties through 1230 PM EST... At 1154 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers from Sandyville to Point Lookout, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harrisville, St. Marys, Elizabeth, Pennsboro, Belmont, Sandyville, North Bend State Park, Newport, Ellenboro, Cairo, Pullman, Alma, Cherry, Smithville, Maxwell, Schultz, Lucille, Mountain, Lima and Hebron. This includes Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 16 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Doddridge; Jackson; Pleasants; Ritchie; Roane; Tyler; Wirt; Wood
